headline: Robinhood’s Stock Price Has Roared Higher. So Why Isn’t It in the S&P 500?
summary: The brokerage firm’s stock has risen 334% over the past year and Robinhood now has a market capitalization of $92 billion.

headline: Why Robinhood (HOOD) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) fell 3.4% in the morning session after Cathie Wood's ARK Invest disclosed that it sold a portion of its holdings in the company.

headline: Are These Stocks the Next FANG? Jim Cramer Thinks So
summary: CNBC's Jim Cramer last week coined a new acronym comprised of some of Wall Street's favorite momentum stocks: PARC, which stands for Palantir, Applovin, Robinhood, and Coinbase.

headline: Citadel Securities Warns SEC Against Rushed Tokenized Securities Rollout
summary: Founded by billionaire Ken Griffin, the firm argued that these blockchain-based products could create unfair advantages and drain liquidity from traditional equity markets.

headline: Where Will Robinhood Stock Be in 5 Years?
summary: It offers exposure to cryptocurrency, which the market loves, but it's also risky.  Robinhood stock has an expensive valuation.  Investment platform Robinhood Markets (NASDAQ: HOOD) stock has exploded over the past year, up nearly 370%.

headline: Don’t Call It Market Timing. But These Are the Best Months to Invest.
summary: For many of us, extra cash burns a hole in our pockets and leads to impulse purchases.  A new study finds that many retail investors, especially those who frequent investing apps such as Robinhood Markets, instead put it into the stock market.
